text:
Oh, really...!
Stuffed animals can be washed...!

Yeah,
some of them don't like water though...

If you gently hand wash them,
they become fluffy.

Did Mom or Na-chan...
do it for me without me knowing...?

So, Tenka... the other day...
spilled juice... on the stuffed animal at home...

Wow, then
we'll have to make it fluffy again, right?

Yeah...! So, next time...
Will invite Na-chan to do laundry with me...!
